Author: fulto3
Text: im going through the same worries, but dont give up. trust me, in the end youll be happy if you stick to eating that 1400-1800. you are doing great  :)

Author: eattillithurts
Text: Accepting a reasonable weight gain is a part of recovery. Maybe next time you will not weight yourself because you want to feel better in your body and not let a number control you.  Just a thought on recovery. I can delete this if you dont want it here.
